fields.name: Active Editors
fields.description: A list of ids of editors that are actively editing a submission.

fields.name: Active Reviewers
fields.description: A list of the reviewers that are actively reviewing the submission

fields.name: Decision
fields.description: The decision that defines the outcome of the workflow

fields.name: Editor Count
fields.description: The number of ediors that must complete their edits before the submission is ready for review.

fields.name: Editor Role
fields.description: The role of editor.

fields.name: Editors to Invite
fields.description: A list of user ids to invite as editors for the submission.

fields.name: Finished Editor
fields.description: The id of a editor that has completed their editing.

fields.name: Finished Editors
fields.description: A list of the IDs of editors that have completed the editing phase in the workflow

fields.name: Finished Reviewer
fields.description: The ID of the reviewer that has completed their review process.

fields.name: Finished Reviewers
fields.description: A list containing the IDs of all reviewers that have completed the review process.

fields.name: Invited Editors
fields.description: An array containing ids of users that have been invited to be editors.

fields.name: Invited Reviewers
fields.description: A list of users that have been invited to be reviewers for the submission.

fields.name: Invitee
fields.description: The id of a person accepting the invitation to edit.

fields.name: Ready Tor Decision
fields.description: Indicates that review is complete and a decision is ready to be made.

fields.name: Ready To Edit
fields.description: Indicates a submission is ready to have editors assigned.

fields.name: Ready To Review
fields.description: Indicates a submission is ready to have reviewers assigned.

fields.name: Resource Identifier
fields.description: A strong, unique identifier of a resource that has been associated with the workflow

fields.name: Reviewee
fields.description: The ID of a user that has accepted the invitation to be an editor.

fields.name: Reviewer Role
fields.description: The Reviewer Role

fields.name: Reviewers To Invite
fields.description: A list of unsers to invite as reviewers on the submission.

fields.name: RSVP
fields.description: A response to an invitation.
